item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Sorry for the previous post, it was meant for your other blog posting, but my super minimized window makes me miss important things when scrolling. Damned commie bosses who don't want me surfing online! :D
item.content:encoded: Sorry for the previous post, it was meant for your other blog posting, but my super minimized window makes me miss important things when scrolling. Damned commie bosses who don’t want me surfing online! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description:
Blog Stats offered through Wordpress is pretty cool, it shows similar data that the google analytics shows, but you can access it via your wordpess admin panel. I also like the Users Online thing, it will show you on your blog, if you choose, how many users are online, but also in your admin panel, show you the number of users and breaks them down into bots, and actual IPs. So you will see: User1 192.168.0.0 (referred)
User 2 (BOT)yahoo
User 3 (BOT)google, etc.. Pretty nice.
item.content:encoded:
Blog Stats offered through WordPress is pretty cool, it shows similar data that the google analytics shows, but you can access it via your wordpess admin panel. I also like the Users Online thing, it will show you on your blog, if you choose, how many users are online, but also in your admin panel, show you the number of users and breaks them down into bots, and actual IPs. So you will see:
User1
192.168.0.0 (referred)

User 2
(BOT)yahoo

User 3
(BOT)google, etc.. Pretty nice.

item.title: By: Kristina
item.dc:creator: Kristina
item.description: slow day in the blog world that THIS is what you blog about?!?! anyways ... i didnt give you permission to post photos of me...j/k... anyways you should take photos of the stuff on your desk at work!! Those are interesting stuff, your monster, nuns calender, skateboard...
